DOC.brief_summary: The aim prospective randomize control study compare prophylactic effect intravenous single dose ondansetron , ramosetron , palonosetron PCA-related nausea vomit urologic laparoscopic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Effects Ondansetron , Ramosetron , Palonosetron Patient-Controlled Analgesia Related Nausea Vomiting After Urologic Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.criteria: ASA I II Patients age ( 2065 yr ) Undergoing Laparoscopic Nephrectomy Patients want patientcontrolled IV analgesia ( IVPCA ) History allergy hypersensitivity 5HT3 antagonist History severe postoperative nausea/vomiting Prolonged QT interval preoperative EKG Hypokalemia , Hypomagnesemia Intestinal obstruction Pregnant female breast feeding mother
